pkgmetadata.longdescription: KeePassXC provides a safe location for your passwords and similar data. It encrypts its databasee with AES either by passphrase or a key file, compatible with a PDA and Windows version.

use.flag: Add support to autotype the passwords into other applications
Use the New Suffix List (NSL) for icon downloader or browser. Lookup is O(1). Supports both right-to-left, left-to-right domains. Fewer top level domain suffixes.
Use the Public Suffix List (NSL) for icon downloader or browser. Lookup is O(log N). Supports only right-to-left domains. More top level domain suffixes.
Support copy-paste for cli in X
Enable database unlocking via hardware keys supporting YubiKey-style HMAC-SHA1 protocol
